Class Player

public class Player extends Character
A class to control the protagonist.

      public Player()

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g, ImageObserver observer)
      This is called in the board repaint method. This repaints the player in the direction it is facing
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics
      observer - ImageObserver

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
      This is how the player receives the keyboard inputs to perform movement. It calls uses the inherited methods from Character.java to move.
      Parameters:
      e - Key that is pressed

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Checks the player's position to see if 1. If a bonus should spawn (according to the player's movement) 2. To reset the trap (according to player's position) 3. IF a reward is collected 4. If the player is punished 5. If a bonus is collected

    • isPlayerAtDoor

      public boolean isPlayerAtDoor()
      checks to see if the player is at the door and is open. Basically if the player has completed the game
      Returns:
      true if player is at door and door is open, false if not
